tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_irrigation_schedule (
    crop_id INT,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    irrigation_schedule JSON,
    water_usage DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY (crop_id)
)

CREATE TABLE WaterUsage (
    usage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id UUID,
    usage_date TIMESTAMP,
    water_used DOUBLE PRECISION,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crop(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FarmCropMapping (
    farm_id INT,
    crop_id INT,
    planting_date DATE,
    harvesting_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES Farm(farm_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crop(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSchedule (
   schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   crop_id INT,
   date DATE,
   amount_water_used FLOAT,
   FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES CropDetails(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterUsage (
   usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   crop_id INT,
   date DATE,
   amount_water_used FLOAT,
   FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES CropDetails(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CropLocation (
   location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   crop_id INT,
   location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
   longitude DECIMAL(9,6),
   FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES CropDetails(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    water_amount FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE water_usage_log (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    date DATE,
    amount FLOAT,
    source_id INT
);
